channel.title: How to get a search bar on google
channel.description:
How do I get google to show a link to my homepage on search results with a little search box so users can search the site?
For example, http://www.google.co.uk/search?q=aston shows a search box, and when I search G400 it opens this, http://www.google.co.uk/search?q=G400&as_sitesearch=aston.ac.uk
Is it a special app or feature I have to pay for? If so, it sux.

item.title: How to get a search bar on google
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“Facinus, post:2, topic:305440”]I’m pretty sure it has soething to do with the sitemap.

However, try setting up an account with google webmaster tools, its probably there.[/quote]

I’ve had an account there for ages and do use a sitemap, which is fairly well structured.

Unhandled is probably right, I’ll have a look at the websites with the search box to spot some similarities.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get a search bar on google

item.title: How to get a search bar on google
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

Server-Unknown.Net:

I heard from a SEO that more links on your website is what ranks your site(links of the same kind on the same page dont count), google looks forward to that. So make a lot of links on your page thats not the same as the ones already placed on it. Also have a meta tag (they use that to search your page on google), I forget wut it is cuz I’ve not done web development in a good long while now.

wrong - please don’t mislead people.

  1. You’re trying to refer to this and you’re doing it wrong.
  2. The keyword meta tag is not used by google or any other major search engines.
  3. so I heard SEOs are human beings.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get a search bar on google

item.title: How to get a search bar on google
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

iirc it’s all automated and your site has to follow some ‘structure’ so their algorithm can detect important pages. Of course, they don’t publish the required structure or algorithm.
